title: Baked Macaroni and Cheese
steps: boil water for noodles (add salt to taste)
while water is boiling, in a bowl, mix together eggs, evaporated milk, salt, pepper, and sugar
cut up block cheese into small blocks
drain water from noodles and return to pot
add shredded cheddar cheese and butter and melt over low heat
mix in milk mixture thouroughly and then the cut up block cheese
bake in oven for 25 minutes of until baked to desired browness
creator: Nya Tyus

title: Buffalo Chicken Ranch Quesadilla
steps: mix buffalo sauce and melted butter in a bowl
pour chicken in bowl with sauce mixture and toss
put tortilla on a skillet and on one half, put chicken, cheese, and ranch
fold over other half of tortilla to close
cook on both sides to desired browness
tips: Add bacon for buffalo chicken, bacon, ranch quesadillas!
creator: Nya Tyus
